DOC.brief_summary: This study seeks to test the hypothesis that endobutton repair of the ruptured distal biceps successfully restores elbow function.
DOC.brief_title: Functional Review of Distal Biceps Re-Insertion
DOC.criteria: primary distal biceps repair with endobutton at least two years from date of surgery any ipsilateral wrist, forearm, or elbow condition any contraindication to having an MRI
